value.title: China unleashes might of AI on next-generation supercomputer to meet demand for more power
value.excerpt: Supercomputer recorded a 75,839-fold boost in handling data for machine learning after a breakthrough in memory management.

value.title: MediaTek unveils Pentonic 2000 chip for next-level 8K 120Hz TV viewing experience
value.excerpt: MediaTek today lifted the curtains on its new Pentonic smart TV family of processors with the introduction of the Pentonic 2000 chip.

value.title: Best new cars cheaper than $40,000
value.excerpt: You definitely don't need to spend $40,000 on a new car. But, if you're prepared to drop that kind of cash on a vehicle, you've come to the right place. With this kind of budget, the options open to some luxury cars and even plush SUVs.

value.title: AWS AI/ML Community attendee guides to AWS re:Invent 2021
value.excerpt: The AWS AI/ML Community has compiled a series of session guides to AWS re:Invent 2021 to help you get the most out of re:Invent this year. value.title: Alphabet’s X lab shares new details about its Everyday Robots robotics initiative
value.excerpt: Alphabet Inc.’s X research lab today provided an update about its Everyday Robots project, which aims to develop robots capable of performing day-to-day tasks such as tidying chairs. The X research lab explores emerging technologies that fall outside the main focus area of parent Alphabet.

value.title: Identifying Patients Needing Help With Squark AutoML At UPMC
value.excerpt: UPMC uses automated machine learning software from Squark to identify patients who may benefit from living donor liver transplants.

value.title: Self-Driving Stocks Join EVs as Next Retail Trader Obsession
value.excerpt: Self-driving technology companies are the latest automotive stocks to become an obsession of retail traders, with firms like Aurora Innovation Inc. surging Friday on high volume.

value.title: 'Mother/Android': Chloë Grace Moretz is on the run from robots in new trailer
value.excerpt: Chloë Grace Moretz is an expecting mother who is trying to survive amid a war with artificial intelligence in the new trailer for upcoming Hulu film, "Mother/Android."

value.title: IEEE: Most Important 2022 Tech Is AI/Machine Learning, Cloud and 5G
value.excerpt: Because of the global pandemic, technology leaders surveyed said in 2021 they accelerated adoption of cloud computing (60 percent), AI and machine learning (51 percent), and 5G (46 percent), among others.

value.title: Google Cloud’s AI/ML stack to power Toronto firm’s NLP platform

value.title: New Amazon Forecast API that creates up to 40% more accurate forecasts and provides explainability
value.excerpt: We’re excited to announce a new forecasting API for Amazon Forecast that generates up to 40% more accurate forecasts and helps you understand which factors, such as price, holidays, weather, or item category, are most influencing your forecasts. value.title: NYC Aims to Be First to Rein in Artificial Intelligence Hiring Tools

value.title: Key executives resign after Pony.ai combines trucking and passenger car R&D units
value.excerpt: Pony.ai, the self-driving startup that operates in both the U.S. and China, has lost at least two executives from its trucking team following the combination of the company’s passenger car and self-driving truck R&D teams.

value.title: Insurtech Company, Kettle, Is Using AI to Insure Against Wildfires
value.excerpt: Kettle, the reinsurance startup that uses advanced deep learning to better protect people from the growing risks associated with climate change, such as California's wildfires, today announced it has been reinsuring homes during the 2021 wildfire season and that it raised a Series A financing round.

value.title: Is The World Ready For A Self-Driving Car?
value.excerpt: Hitting Apple's ambitious 2025 target depends entirely on the company’s ability to design, build and test its self-driving system.

value.title: Policymakers want to regulate AI but lack consensus on how
value.excerpt: Commentary: AI is considered "world changing" by policymakers, but it's unclear how to ensure positive outcomes.

value.title: Two Young Roommates Are Building An Artificial Intelligence Real Estate Empire
value.excerpt: It's amazing to see that the pandemic has created a boom in entrepreneurialism and shown how AI and tech, along with the human touch, can both improve the lives of people and build new innovative businesses.

value.title: SenseTime gets green light from Hong Kong exchange to proceed with US$2 billion IPO, sources say
value.excerpt: SenseTime has got the green light from the Hong Kong stock exchange to proceed with its flotation, according to people familiar with the transaction, taking the largest artificial intelligence (AI) company in China a step closer to its US$2 billion initial public offering.

value.title: Self-driving robots key to future of food
value.excerpt: The acquisition is a sign of rapid maturation in smart farming, which uses IoT sensors and AI to manage farm operations with unprecedented precision and is helping reshape food manufacturing in wealthy markets.

value.title: Jensen Huang gets chip industry’s highest honor 28 years after founding Nvidia
value.excerpt: About 38 years after he started Nvidia, CEO Jensen Huang received the chip industry's highest honor, the Robert N. Noyce Award.

value.title: Apple Accelerates Work on Car Project, Aiming for Fully Autonomous Vehicle

value.title: Overcoming The Technological Speed Bumps On The Road To Autonomous Driving
value.excerpt: Three years ago, fully autonomous vehicles (AVs) that could take passengers 'anywhere' were supposed to have arrived on the market — at least according (paywall) to a 2015 prediction from Elon Musk. Musk was hardly alone.

value.title: Meet The Boundary-Breaking Jewelry Artists Showing Alongside Ai Weiwei In Force Of Nature Exhibition
